overview:
Robert is a web entrepreneur, startup specialist and networker. He is currently part of the founding team of 2 startups that are launching in 2011.

Robert has hosted over 100 events for the London creative and tech scene through Internet People and YesAndClub.

Prior to starting Internet People Robert co-founded Soflow Ltd in November 2003, which was an early play in the business social networking space. Soflow raised $5 million dollars from Northbridge Ventures and Kodiak Ventures in April 2006. Robert left shortly after the the round was closed and Soflow Inc went on to launch Wis.dm.

Robert also co-founded Marketingfix.com in 2003 and under its new name, MarketingVox, it is now a publication covering Internet Marketing.
